places_to_visit.name: CN Tower
places_to_visit.description: The CN Tower is a landmark observation tower offering stunning views of Toronto from its observation decks. The EdgeWalk, a thrilling outdoor walk around the tower's edge, provides an adrenaline-pumping experience.

places_to_visit.name: Royal Ontario Museum
places_to_visit.description: The Royal Ontario Museum is one of the largest museums in North America, featuring extensive exhibits on art, culture, and natural history. Its architecture combines historic and modern elements, making it a visual delight.

places_to_visit.name: Toronto Islands
places_to_visit.description: The Toronto Islands are a group of small islands located just off the coast of downtown Toronto. They offer beautiful beaches, picnic areas, and bike rentals, making them a great spot for a relaxing day out.

places_to_visit.name: Distillery District
places_to_visit.description: The Distillery District is a historic area known for its well-preserved Victorian buildings, art galleries, boutiques, and craft breweries. It's a popular destination for strolling, shopping, and dining.
